install.name: RS-FlashMatic
install.author: RS Web Solutions
install.copyright: Copyright (c) 2010-2015 RS Web Solutions - Development Team
install.description: RS-FlashMatic is a flash slideshow module. This is a Joomla extension specially developed for Joomla version 1.5.x. This is a highly customizable XML Image Rotator with more than 35 XML options, including the masking size and speed. You can control the position of the elements on the screen, the number of images, as well as the colors - all from XML. You can use this module in any size you need.

param.default:
SWFOBJECT Insertion:
By default this is 'YES'. That means the module will add the required SWFOBJECT JavaScript library file. But if you think the SWFOBJECT is already inserted in your website (by your template or by any other component/module/plugin) then you can set it to 'NO' so it will prevent the double insertion of the same file.

param.name: rsws_insertSWFOBJECT
param.label: Insert SWFOBJECT File
param.description: By default this is 'YES'. That means the module will add the required SWFOBJECT JavaScript library file. But if you think the SWFOBJECT is already inserted in your website (by your template or by any other component/module/plugin) then you can set it to 'NO' so it will prevent the double insertion of the same file.

param.name: rsws_width
param.label: Slideshow Width
param.description: Width of the Slideshow in pixel (default value: 600)

param.name: rsws_height
param.label: Slideshow Height
param.description: Height of the Slideshow in pixel (default value: 300)

param.name: rsws_random
param.label: Show Images Randomly
param.description: Show Images Randmoly or Not. (default value: NO)

param.name: rsws_backgroundColor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Color of the background in hex-code, do not add # (default value: FFFFFF)

param.name: rsws_backgroundTransparency
param.label: Background Transparency
param.description: Transparency of the background. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means no transparency, 100 means fully transparent. (default value: 100)

param.name: rsws_loaderColor
param.label: Loader Color
param.description: Color of the Loader in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 000000)

param.default:
Cell Configuration
In time of transition from one image to other, the image will splits into small pieces/cells. Here you can configure the behavior of those cells

param.name: rsws_cellWidth
param.label: Cell Width
param.description: Width of Cell in pixel (default value: 50)

param.name: rsws_cellHeight
param.label: Cell Height
param.description: Height of Cell in pixel (default value: 50)

param.name: rsws_showMinTime
param.label: Cell Show Time Minimum
param.description: Minimum Show Time of Cell in seconds (default value: 0.2)

param.name: rsws_showMaxTime
param.label: Cell Show Time Maximum
param.description: Maximum Show Time of Cell in seconds (default value: 1.5)

param.default:
Cell Border Configuration
In time of transition from one image to other, the image will splits into small pieces/cells. Here you can configure the border style of those cells

param.name: rsws_blur
param.label: Blur
param.description: Blurriness of the border. Any value from 0 to 100. (default value: 50)

param.name: rsws_netTime
param.label: Border Display Time
param.description: Display Time of Border in seconds (default value: 0.5)

param.name: rsws_alphaNet
param.label: Border Prominency
param.description: How prominent the border will display. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means border will not display, 100 means border is fully prominent. (default value: 80)

param.name: rsws_netColor
param.label: Border Color
param.description: Color of the Border in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 000000)

param.default:
Navigation Bar Controller Style
Here you can control all settings of Navigation/Controller Bar.

param.name: rsws_controllerVisible
param.label: Display Controller
param.description: Display Controller or Not. (default value: YES)

param.name: rsws_controllerBackgroundVisible
param.label: Display Controller Background
param.description: Display Background of the Controller or Not. (default value: YES)

param.name: rsws_prevNextVisible
param.label: Display Previous-Next Button
param.description: Display Previous-Next Button or Not. (default value: YES)

param.name: rsws_playBtVisible
param.label: Display Play-Pause Button
param.description: Display Play-Pause Button or Not. (default value: YES)

param.name: rsws_autoPlay
param.label: Auto Play
param.description: Start Auto Playing the Slides or not. (default value: YES)

param.name: rsws_navigationButtonsColor
param.label: Navigation Button Color
param.description: Color of the Navigation Button in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 000000)

param.name: rsws_controllerDistanceX
param.label: Controller Left-Right Padding
param.description: Padding/Spacing of the Controller Bar in Left and Right. Value in pixel. (default value: 10)

param.name: rsws_controllerDistanceY
param.label: Controller Padding from Bottom
param.description: Padding/Spacing of the Controller Bar from Bottom. Value in pixel. (default value: 10)

param.name: rsws_controllerHeight
param.label: Controller Height
param.description: Height of the Controller in pixel. (default value: 27)

param.name: rsws_distanceBetweenControllerElements
param.label: Distance Between Controller Buttons
param.description: Distance Between Controller Buttons in pixel. (default value: 10)

param.name: rsws_normalColor
param.label: Navigation Text Color
param.description: Color of the Navigation Text in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 000000)

param.name: rsws_overColor
param.label: Navigation Text Over Color
param.description: Color of the Navigation Text when you Mouse-Over, in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 473C31)

param.name: rsws_selectedTextColor
param.label: Selected Navigation Text Color
param.description: Color of the Navigation Text when Selected, in hex-code, do not add # (default value: FFFFFF)

param.name: rsws_selectedButtonAlpha
param.label: Background Prominency of Selected Text
param.description: How prominent the background will display of selected texts. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means background will not display, 100 means background is fully prominent. (default value: 70)

param.name: rsws_distanceBetweenThumbs
param.label: Distance Between Navigation Texts
param.description: Distance Between Controller Buttons in pixel. (default value: 7)

param.default:
Image Caption Display Settings
Here you can set the display style of image caption i.e. the display style of Title, Description and Read-More text.

param.name: rsws_captionY
param.label: Caption Box Padding from Top
param.description: Padding/Spacing of the Caption Box from Top. Value in pixel. (default value: 10)

param.name: rsws_captionX
param.label: Caption Box Padding from Right
param.description: Padding/Spacing of the Caption Box from Right. Value in pixel. (default value: 10)

param.name: rsws_captionWidth
param.label: Width of Caption Box
param.description: Width of Caption Box in pixel. (default value: 390)

param.name: rsws_buttonText
param.label: 'Read More' Button Text
param.description: Text of 'Read More' Button. (default value: read more)

param.name: rsws_btnNormalColor
param.label: 'Read More' Text Color
param.description: Color of 'Read More' text, in hex-code, do not add # (default value: FFFFFF)

param.name: rsws_btnOverColor
param.label: 'Read More' Text Over Color
param.description: Color of 'Read More' text when mouse-over, in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 999999)

param.name: rsws_readMoreBackAlpha
param.label: Background Prominency of 'Read More' Button
param.description: How prominent the background will display of 'Read More' button. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means background will not display, 100 means background is fully prominent. (default value: 80)

param.name: rsws_readMoreBackColor
param.label: Background Color of 'Read More' button
param.description: Background Color of 'Read More' button, in hex-code, do not add # (default value: 473C31)

param.name: rsws_btnSpacingW
param.label: 'Read More' Text Left-Right Padding
param.description: Padding/Spacing of the text from Left and Right of 'Read More' Button. Value in pixel. (default value: 50)

param.name: rsws_btnSpacingH
param.label: 'Read More' Text Top-Bottom Padding
param.description: Padding/Spacing of the text from Top and Bottom of 'Read More' Button. Value in pixel. (default value: 5)

param.name: rsws_paddingX
param.label: Caption Box Inner Left-Right Padding
param.description: Inner Padding/Spacing of the Caption Box from Left and Right. Value in pixel. (default value: 20)

param.name: rsws_paddingY
param.label: Caption Box Inner Top-Bottom Padding
param.description: Inner Padding/Spacing of the Caption Box from Top and Bottom. Value in pixel. (default value: 15)

param.name: rsws_imageshow
param.label: Image Configuration
param.description: Choose how you wish to configure the image display. The first one is easy to configure. For advanced users the second option will give much more advanced configurable options.
param.option: BASIC (Display all images from a folder that I will specify below.)
ADVANCED (Display only those images that I will specify below)

param.default: Start of Image Configuration - BASIC
Use this section if you previously selected the 'Image Configuration' as BASIC

param.name: rsws_basic_folder
param.label: Image Folder
param.description: Specify the path of image folder. (default value: images/stories/slideshow/)

param.name: rsws_basic_url
param.label: Link to images
param.description: If you wish to redirect the visitors to a particular url after clicking the images, then please specify the url here. (Example: http://www.yoursite.com/)

param.name: rsws_basic_url_target
param.label: Open link in
param.description: Open the link in the same window or in a new window.

param.name: rsws_basic_bar_color
param.label: Navigation/Controller Bar Background Color
param.description: Background color of Navigation Bar Controller in hex-code, do not add # (default: FFFFFF)

param.name: rsws_basic_bar_transparency
param.label: Navigation/Controller Bar Transparency
param.description: Transparency of Navigation Bar Controller. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means not transparent, 100 means fully transparent. (default: 40)

param.name: rsws_basic_slideshowTime
param.label: Slideshow Time
param.description: How many seconds one image will display before moving on to the next image. (default: 4)

param.default: End of Image Configuration - BASIC
Start of Image Configuration - ADVANCED
Use this section if you previously selected the 'Image Configuration' as ADVANCED

param.name: rsws_adv_path
param.label:
Image(s) Path

Example:
{Image A}
{Image B}
param.description: Specify the relative path of all your images, within {}. Do not add absolute path. Only add relative path. (Example: {images/stories/slideshow/image1.jpg} {images/stories/slideshow/image2.jpg} )

param.name: rsws_adv_title
param.label:
Image(s) Title

Example:
{Title A}
{Title B}
param.description: Specify the title of the images, within {}. (Example: {Sample Title 1} {Sample Title 1} )

param.name: rsws_adv_caption
param.label:
Image(s) Caption/Description

Example:
{Caption A}
{Caption B}
param.description: Specify the caption/description of the images, within {}. (Example: {Sample Caption 1} {Sample Caption 1} )

param.name: rsws_adv_link
param.label:
Link to Image(s)

Example:
{http://www.test1.com/}
{http://www.test2.com/}
param.description: Specify the link of the images, within {}. (Example: {http://www.example1.com/} {http://www.example2.com/} )

param.name: rsws_adv_target
param.label:
Open link(s) in

Example:
{_self}
{_blank}
param.description: Open the link(s) in the same window or in a new window, within {}. You have 2 options '_blank' or '_self'. (Example: {_self} {_blank} )

param.name: rsws_adv_bar_color
param.label:
Navigation/Controller Bar Background Color(s)

Example:
{FFFFFF}
{FEFEFE}
param.description: Background color(s) of Navigation Bar Controller in hex-code, within {}, do not add #. (Example: {FFFFFF} {FEFEFE} )

param.name: rsws_adv_bar_transparency
param.label:
Navigation/Controller Bar Transparency(s)

Example:
{40}
{50}
param.description: Specify the Navigation/Controller Bar Transparency, within {}. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means not transparent, 100 means fully transparent. (Example: {40} {50} )

param.name: rsws_adv_caption_color
param.label:
Caption Box(es) Background Color

Example:
{FFFFFF}
{FEFEFE}
param.description: Specify the background color of caption box(es), within {}. (Example: {FFFFFF} {FEFEFE} )

param.name: rsws_adv_caption_transparency
param.label:
Caption Box(es) Background Transparency

Example:
{60}
{50}
param.description: Specify the background transparency of caption box(es), within {}. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means not transparent, 100 means fully transparent. (Example: {60} {50} )

param.name: rsws_adv_stroke_color
param.label:
Caption Box(es) Border Color

Example:
{FFFFFF}
{FEFEFE}
param.description: Specify the border color of caption box(es), within {}. (Example: {FFFFFF} {FEFEFE} )

param.name: rsws_adv_stroke_transparency
param.label:
Caption Box(es) Border Prominency

Example:
{60}
{70}
param.description: Specify the border prominency of caption box(es), within {}. Any value from 0 to 100. 0 means border will not display, 100 means border will fully prominent. (Example: {60} {70} )

param.name: rsws_adv_slideshowTime
param.label:
Slideshow Time(s)

Example:
{4}
{5}
param.description: How many seconds image(s) will display before moving on to the next image, within {}. (Example: {4} {5} )

param.default: End of Image Configuration - ADVANCED

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Module Caching

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
